game.name: RAD: Repeat After Death
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The task is simple, defeat enemies using various Characters. But, your past move will consume you the more you continue down the path. Discover the dungeon mysteries while engaging with the other dungeon dwellers
game.shortDescriptionEn: The task is simple, defeat enemies using various Characters. But, your past move will consume you the more you continue down the path. Discover the dungeon mysteries while engaging with the other dungeon dwellers
